messages.title: Your voice in Westminster, standing up for Teesside
messages.content: Working for you every day, not just at election time

messages.title: I'M PROUD OF MY RECORD: FIGHTING BACK FOR YOU
messages.content: I've fought tooth and nail for our community to make sure your voice is heard in Westminster. Two years ago, you put your trust in me to serve our community as your Member of Parliament. I try to repay that trust by working hard every day to make sure your voice is heard again in Westminster. From fighting to save our steel and challenging Tory and Lib Dem cuts to our schools and hospitals, to securing investment for our town centres, I have been your local champion. You are my boss. I'm asking for your support again to continue to serve you and to fight your corner.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Fought tooth and nail for steelworks when the Tories closed it.
Helped secure compensation for steelworkers with Community Union.
Campaigned against medical centre closures and housing land bank wedge.
Helped secure £5 million investment for town centres.
Won back over £200,000 for local people.
Brought forward a Bill to toughen up animal cruelty sentences.
Voted to trigger Article 50 after you spoke loud and clear.

issues.brexitEurope: Voted to trigger Article 50 after you spoke loud and clear.
issues.education: Challenging Tory and Lib Dem cuts to our schools.

housing.content: Campaigned against housing land bank wedge.

leaflet.personalStatement: I've fought tooth and nail for our community to make sure your voice is heard in Westminster.

politicalExperience.achievements: Fought to save steel and challenged Tory and Lib Dem cuts to our schools and hospitals, secured investment for town centres.
